about_section.title: About me
about_section.description: Computer Engineer with an MBA in Full Stack Development, experienced in both Front-End and Back-End development. Skilled in delivering efficient and scalable solutions, focusing on high performance and code quality through best development practices.

work_experience_section.title: Work experience
work_experience_section.description_position: Summary of my professional experience in the company

experiences.description: Refactoring with SOLID and Clean Code, environment management, automated deployment, integration with secure payments and authentication via OAuth, JWT and RBAC.
Full stack development with microservices, Kafka, monorepo with TurboRepo, automated tests and Storybook for standardization and efficiency in the workflow.
Development with TypeScript, Next.js and TailwindCSS, secure authentication with NextAuth and deployment automation via CI/CD with GitHub Actions for efficiency.
Team leadership, technology definition, version control with Git Flow and unit testing to ensure quality, scalability and efficient collaboration.
Bug fixing, monitoring with New Relic, scalable development, code review and participation in sprints to optimize deliveries and user experience.

education.description: Postgraduate degree lato sensu MBA in Full Stack Development
